name: MealMaker
0:
”"Alexa, ask meal maker to make a meal."”
”"Alexa, start meal maker"”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meal maker
des:
This Alexa skills will help you find a delicious meal to make with the ingredients you already have! 

Simply ask Meal Maker to make a meal, and then list the ingredients (up to 10) you have. Alexa will search the internet far and wide for recipes that use your ingredients.

Once she find them, she'll ask if you want a specific recipe. If you don't, she'll respond with a new one that you may like instead.

When you've decided on a recipe, the ingredient list and instructions will be sent directly to device's Alexa App.

Before beginning, please make sure you know your ingredients. 

Happy cooking!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
